Text: Do you have the regular version of the last episode? I cannot get this version type top work on my Mac.

Tried downloading this huge file. Gave up after 8 hours at only 4% completed. Not sure why the smaller version has not been posted. For those who want to see the final - it is posted on YouTube in 4 parts - The Apprentice UK: Series 6, Episode 13 Final ! ( Part 1 of 4 ), etc. Nowhere near as good a quality as TVTeam, but needs must.

Many thanks snkhatri. I've been downloading this ridiculously oversized file for 14 hours and it was at 60% when I abandoned it and downloaded from the link you've supplied. Thanks again.

the shorter version has the ending cut off!!

just before Sugar is about to announce the winner...

where can we find the last You're Fired, You're Hired??

sorry, didnt notice the Spoiler in the link address!

Don't bother downloading this file.  It cuts off the end!  What a let down.  This is the second one I have downloaded that cut off at the same point.  Whilst I appreciate people taking the time to upload files, it is hugely disappointing to have it cut off before finding out who won!!!  I know I can look it up on the Internet, but it is not the same as watching Lord Sugar deliver the "You Are Hired" line!!!!
